name: Cooked Raw
description:
Cooked raw is made for the 2022 Gamedev.js Jam.

You are a chef ready to have a showdown in the kitchen. While the raw foods charging at you, you will need to chop them down before you can cook them down!

WASD to move around

Left-click to melee attack

Right-click to use ranged attack

Scroll wheel or number buttons to switch the current inventory slot

Stand next to the pot with food on hand and press E to put food into the pot

Stand next to the pot after it's done cooking to take the dish out

While holding the dish, you can left-click to eat the dish and gain buffs

Stand next to the window with the correct dish on hand and press E to serve the dish

There are 3 rounds to this game, can you beat them all?

Programmed by Wentao G.

Art by Rhiannon R.
